name: The Joy of Finger Painting
description:
Made with love in 48 hours for MiniJam 111: Colors
(Limitation: "You Are Your Own Enemy")

FAQ:

1. How many levels are there? There are only 8 levels. I'm sure you're almost there!

2. Is this game worth beating? I spent most of the Jam working on the end screen. It is truly beautiful.

3. Is there any way to lose this game? You are your own enemy. The only way to lose is to close this tab yourself.

4. Favorite gameplay mechanic? Getting up and going to fetch a glass of water.

5. My head hurts. That's not really a question now is it?

Music/SFX from Kevin MacLeod, Stephen Foster, and Mixkit.
